alert.note: Alert for Colbert; Franklin; Lawrence; Morgan (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 5:59PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Colbert, northeastern Franklin, west central Morgan and central Lawrence Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 559 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles east of Russellville to 10 miles west of Hartselle. Movement was northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Decatur, Moulton, Trinity, Mt Hope, Chalybeate Springs, La Grange, Speake, Ne Smith, Caddo and Wren. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
